# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/tmp`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for tmp ( http://github.com/raszi/node-tmp ).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/tmp
